flow.descriptionCdata:
16eb7b4b-2284-4337-8f78-088decff1c73.1942902f-8ce1-4620-a091-8791dfa89236.description=
This operation checks whether a string matches another string, using a specific matching rule. The "toMatch" input is the string that is checked for matching the "matchTo" expression. 

Inputs\:
    matchType - The type of match to perform.
Valid values\: Exact Match, Contains, Contains Once, Does Not Contain, Match All Words, Match No Words, Regex
Default value\: Exact Match
    toMatch - The string that is checked for matching.
    matchTo - The string to match against.
Example\: If "matchType" is “RegEx”, the "matchTo" input is a regular expression such as\: ^-?\d+(([\.,]\d+)?)+$. 
    ignoreCase - Specifies whether to ignore case when matching or not.
Valid values\: False, True
Default value\: False

Results\:
    returnResult - This is the primary output. It contains the string "Matches" if the "toMatch" string matches the "matchTo" string. Otherwise, it contains the string "Does Not Match".  

Responses\:
    success - The operation completed as stated in the description.
    failure - The operation completed unsuccessfully.
16eb7b4b-2284-4337-8f78-088decff1c73.302619ed-b38e-43a4-afa5-15fed44ee716.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 16eb7b4b-2284-4337-8f78-088decff1c73.8a7ac4dc-a0d6-490d-ac75-7d0855f246b5.description=Generic flow to send an e-mail 16eb7b4b-2284-4337-8f78-088decff1c73.9154e898-fa47-4ac6-be28-52f060a07a0a.description=Generic flow to send an e-mail 16eb7b4b-2284-4337-8f78-088decff1c73.95240b1e-616e-4ca1-8cd4-9e1eb0b22f98.description=Generic flow to send an e-mail 16eb7b4b-2284-4337-8f78-088decff1c73.95cf5ab3-c461-4e34-b323-92c091bc949e.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 16eb7b4b-2284-4337-8f78-088decff1c73.dda45e98-1899-45cc-a895-ca412a0e3ba8.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 16eb7b4b-2284-4337-8f78-088decff1c73.ee5b9c91-2f71-496d-aeb9-128c1ccad605.description=
Sends an smtp email
 
Input Parameters\:
hostname - hostname or ip address of smtp server
port - port smtp service is listening
from - from email address
to - email address(s) or recipients
subject - email subject
body - body of the email
htmlEmail - true or false, whether the email should be sent supporting html rich email.
readReceipt - true or false, whether or not to request a read receipt
attachments - comma separated list of files to attach (must be full path)
username - if SMTP authentication is needed, the username to send
password - the password to use
characterSet - the character set encoding for the entire email which includes subject, body, attached file name and the attached file. Default value is UTF-8
contentTransferEncoding - the content transfer encoding scheme (such as 7bit, 8bit, base64, quoted-printable etc) for the entire email which includes subject, body, attached file name and the attached file. Default value is - quoted-printable or Q Encoding.
 
 Responses\:
 success - successfully sent the email
 failure - failed to send the email

Note\:
For special characters (East Asian, right-to-left languages, etc.) you must install the support files on your local machine.
	For doing this on Windows go to Control Panel -> Regional and Language Options -> Language and check the options at Supplemental language support.
16eb7b4b-2284-4337-8f78-088decff1c73.f5857a58-109a-4802-ad06-9d4f9cdc9a42.description=Generic flow to send an e-mail
flow.name: pc_lc_on_demand_backup

staticBinding.value: Please add On Demand Backup for ${server.hostname}

Dear Technical team,

A user has requested to create a full backup of server: ${server.hostname}. Please create a ticket to the backup team and specify "${db.getdetails.contactemail}" as the contact person who should be informed once the backup is completed. Backup should be started in 4 hours from now.
